comments.body: I think this should be documented in https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources-jdbc.html
Nit: back-ticks aren't meaningful here right?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +179,183 @@      case "SERIALIZABLE" => Connection.TRANSACTION_SERIALIZABLE
      case other => throw new IllegalArgumentException(
        s"Invalid value `$other` for parameter `$JDBC_TXN_ISOLATION_LEVEL`. This can be " +
          "`NONE`, `READ_UNCOMMITTED`, `READ_COMMITTED`, `REPEATABLE_READ` or `SERIALIZABLE`."
      )
